issue.title: [CF 1276] Trying to track Twist of Fate trigger condition?
issue.body:
I have no idea how to pull it off, I want to to track the group I am in so I tried group 1-40 and set the unit condiiton to <=40% HP. I did this under the Unit Condition Icon, is that the proper area, or am I doing something wrong??


> Posted by CurseForge user turtle328 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1276 | Raw

comments.body:
Not sure what your end goal is here. What do you want to see and when do you want to see it?

Do you want an icon that will show when anyone in the raid is less than 40% health? If so, a Unit Condition icon would indeed be ideal. What about this isn't working?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

It's not consistently working, it sometimes shows and sometimes it won't go away even if the <=40% condition isn't met.


> Posted by CurseForge user turtle328

@Cybeloras: Go

I fixed it by Reseting the icon and doing it all over again, now it works, very strange... Sorry for false alarm! Glad I was in the right direction all along.


> Posted by CurseForge user turtle328
